columns.name: member_account_id
columns.description: The ID of the member account.

columns.name: detector_id
columns.description: The detector ID of the member account.

columns.name: email
columns.description: The email address of the member account.

columns.name: invited_at
columns.description: The timestamp when the invitation was sent.

columns.name: relationship_status
columns.description: The status of the relationship between the member and the administrator.

columns.description: The last-updated timestamp of the member.
